tl_PH {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%a%N%f%N%d%N%b%N%h %s %e %r%N%%T %z%N%c%N" }
    }
    CountryISBNNumber { "840" }
    CountryNumber { "840" }
    CurrencyElements { 
            "PhP",
            "PHP ",
            ".",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Tagalog language locale for Philipines" }
        Source { "Rene Torres" }
        Address { "" }
        Contact { "Rene Torres, Pablo Saratxaga" }
        Email { "rgtorre@rocketmail.com, pablo@mandrakesoft.com" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Tagalog" }
        Territory { "Philipines" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "0.2" }
        Date { "2001-01-28" }
    }
    LanguageLibraryUse { "eng" }
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[yY].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "Mr." }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "Miss." }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "Mrs." }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "Ms." }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4#,##0.00;-\u00A4 #,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c (%a) %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "11" }
        InternationalPrefix { "1" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            AmPmMarkers{
                    "AM",
                    "PM",
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy  z",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss aa z",
                    "MMMM/dd/yy",
                    "MMMM/dd/yy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Lin",
                            "Lun",
                            "Mar",
                            "Miy",
                            "Huw",
                            "Biy",
                            "Sab",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "Linggo",
                            "Lunes",
                            "Martes",
                            "Miyerkoles",
                            "Huwebes",
                            "Biyernes",
                            "Sabado",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Ene",
                            "Peb",
                            "Mar",
                            "Abr",
                            "May",
                            "Hun",
                            "Hul",
                            "Ago",
                            "Sep",
                            "Okt",
                            "Nob",
                            "Dis",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "Enero",
                            "Pebrero",
                            "Marso",
                            "Abril",
                            "Mayo",
                            "Hunyo",
                            "Hulyo",
                            "Agosto",
                            "Septiyembre",
                            "Oktubre",
                            "Nobiyembre",
                            "Disyembre",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
